name: Key Adventure
description:
Welcome to Key Adventure!

This is a simple collect the keys game, that I made during Ludum Dare 36 (August 2016).

Keys: Arrow Keys. (You may have to click on the nice 'picture' above to start the game.)

If you run out of HP, you have to refresh this page on your browser.

Collect all the keys to win!

Also, hearts will refill your HP.

Note: The game has no sounds or music.

Tip: You might want to hold multiple directions to squeeze yourself between small paths.

Trivia: This game is written in vanilla Javascript.
